Thank you very much!  I'm not so good at figuring out emperor years 
(sweatdrop).  I'll have to add that stuff to my list, and I wonder 
if those Japanese sites have any other dates... I can't believe I 
could never find Okita's birthday before, and now I see it in many 
places. (sigh) I'm so happy.

Now, I need to figure out how wordperfect can make its calendar 
project an image or something like that.  I'll find a way, and then 
it shall be completed.  Thank you so very much to everybody!
